id.description: an id composed of the article id and the category management entry id. It *must* be used in the detail url.

canonicalId.description: An id that will be uniqu accross the category manegement entries. It *must* be used on the canonical link in the meta

shortage.description: if different than empty string, this product is in shortage and is not sellable anymore

get.summary: returns all the categories matching the filters

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: To filter on a specific tag. Empty means no filter.

schema.description: To filter on a specific tag. Empty means no filter.
